Purpose: To detect and identify mycobacteria in blood specimens for diagnosis of tuberculosis and other mycobacterial infections.
Container: Myco/F Lytic bottle or other mycobacterial blood culture bottle
Equipment: Automated blood culture system (e.g., BACTEC or BacT/ALERT), Class II biosafety cabinet, incubator (35–37 °C), MGIT tubes, Ziehl-Neelsen staining kit, GeneXpert system
